name: Brick Puzzle - Expert of Hexa
description:
Play the best brick puzzle game for FREE!

Brick Puzzle - Expert of Hexa is a tetris type block puzzle game. Easy to play, use your logic to move the different colour blocks to fit in the field and collect points!

5 different game types:
Classic
Plus
Bomb
Survival
Hexa

Compete with you FRIENDS and players all over the world - become the king of brick puzzle!

Brick Puzzle - Expert of Hexa is made just for you!
